Candy Bar Copycat

CANDY BAR COPYCAT: ALMOND MOUND

A simple, three-ingredient protein bar that tastes like an Almond Joy, but healthier and with 20g of protein.

20g
Protein
280
Calories
10m
Total Time
10
Yield

Nutrition per 1 bar

Carbs15g
Fat20g
Fiber7g
Sugar5g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 150g shredded coconut
  • 120g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 120g coconut cream
  • 20 whole almonds
  • 100g dark chocolate chips

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Mix the base

In a bowl, combine the shredded coconut, protein powder, and coconut cream. Mix until a sticky dough forms.

2

Form bars

Shape the dough into 10 bars and press two almonds onto the top of each bar.

3

Freeze

Place the bars on a parchment-lined plate and freeze for 15 minutes.

4

Melt chocolate

Melt the dark chocolate chips in the microwave.

5

Coat bars

Dip each bar in the melted chocolate, ensuring it is fully coated.

6

Chill and serve

Refrigerate until the chocolate is set, then serve.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
